orinoco
Class Heading

java.lang.Object
  orinoco.layout.HeaderDefinition
      orinoco.Heading
public class Heading
extends orinoco.layout.HeaderDefinition

A column heading for a table. If font or alignment are not specified for this heading, then the heading will assume the heading to have the same font or alignment as the rest of the column
